Documentation.short_help: Write stereo lithography files.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

Documentation.short_help: Write polygonal data in Stanford University PLY format.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

PWriterProxy.name: CSVWriter

Documentation.short_help: Write CSV files in Parallel

PWriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write CSV files, works in parallel or serial.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The name of the file to write.

Proxy.name: ParallelWriterBase

Documentation.short_help: Defines the interface for the parallel writers.

Proxy.Documentation: This defines the interface for the parallel writers. One should not try to create an instance of this proxy since it merely defines the interface.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The name of the file to be written.

IntVectorProperty.name: GhostLevel
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The number of ghost levels to include in the output file(s). Note that some writers (such as ExodusIIWriter) may not support writing ghost levels.

Proxy.name: XMLWriterBase

Documentation.short_help: This defines the interface for XML-based vtk data files writer.

Proxy.Documentation: This defines the interface for XML-based vtk data files writer. One should not try to create an instance of this proxy since it merely defines the interface.

IntVectorProperty.name: DataMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The mode uses for writing the file's data i.e. ascii, binary, appended binary.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The name of the file to be written.

Proxy.name: DataWriterBase

Documentation.short_help: defines the interface for legacy vtk data files writer.

Proxy.Documentation: This defines the interface for legacy vtk data files writer. One should not try to create an instance of this proxy since it merely defines the interface.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The name of the file to be written.

IntVectorProperty.name: FileType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The type for the data file (i.e. ascii or binary).

Proxy.name: ParallelXMLWriterBase

Documentation.short_help: Defines the interface for XML-based parallel vtk data files writer.

Proxy.Documentation: This defines the interface for XML-based parallel vtk data files writer. One should not try to create an instance of this proxy since it merely defines the interface.

IntVectorProperty.name: GhostLevel
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The number of ghost levels to include in the output file(s).

PWriterProxy.name: XMLPVDWriter

Documentation.short_help: Write ParaView data files (pvd).

PWriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write ParaView data files (pvd). It is used to save all pieces of a source/filter to a file with pieces spread across the server processes.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the files.

WriterProxy.name: XMLPolyDataWriter

Documentation.short_help: Write poly data in a xml-based vtk data file.

WriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write poly data in a xml-based vtk data file. Cannot be used for parallel writing.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

WriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write unstructured grid in a xml-based vtk data file. Cannot be used for parallel writing.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

WriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write a multiblock dataset in a xml-based vtk data file. Cannot be used for parallel writing.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

WriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write a hierarchical box dataset in a xml-based vtk data file. Cannot be used for parallel writing.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

PWriterProxy.name: XMLPPolyDataWriter

Documentation.short_help: Write polydata in a xml-based vtk data file.

PWriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write polydata in a xml-based vtk data file. Can be used for parallel writing.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

PWriterProxy.name: XMLPUnstructuredGridWriter

Documentation.short_help: Write unstructured grid in a xml-based vtk data file.

PWriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write unstructured grid in a xml-based vtk data file. Can be used for parallel writing.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

PWriterProxy.name: XMLPStructuredGridWriter

Documentation.short_help: Write structured grid in a xml-based vtk data file.

PWriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write structured grid in a xml-based vtk data file. Can be used for parallel writing.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

PWriterProxy.name: XMLPRectilinearGridWriter

Documentation.short_help: Write rectilinear grid in a xml-based vtk data file.

PWriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write rectilinear grid in a xml-based vtk data file. Can be used for parallel writing.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

PWriterProxy.name: XMLPImageDataWriter

Documentation.short_help: Write image data in a xml-based vtk data file.

PWriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write image data in a xml-based vtk data file. Can be used for parallel writing.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

PWriterProxy.name: XMLPMultiBlockDataWriter

Documentation.short_help: Write a multiblock in a xml-based vtk data file.

PWriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write a multiblock dataset in a xml-based vtk data file. Can be used for parallel writing.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

PWriterProxy.name: XMLPHierarchicalBoxDataWriter

Documentation.short_help: Write a hierarchical box dataset in a xml-based vtk data file.

PWriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write a hierarchical box in a xml-based vtk data file. Can be used for parallel writing.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

WriterProxy.name: DataSetWriter

Documentation.short_help: Write any type of data object in a legacy vtk data file.

WriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write any type of data object in a legacy vtk data file. Cannot be used for parallel writing.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

PSWriterProxy.name: PDataSetWriter

Documentation.short_help: Writer that writes polydata as legacy vtk files.

PSWriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write any type of data object in a legacy vtk data file. This version is used when running in parallel. It gathers data to first node and saves 1 file.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The name of the file to be written.

PSWriterProxy.name: PPLYWriter

Documentation.short_help: Write polygonal data in Stanford University PLY format.

PSWriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write polygonal data in Stanford University PLY format. The data can be written in either binary (little or big endian) or ASCII representation. As for PointData and CellData, vtkPLYWriter cannot handle normals or vectors. It only handles RGB PointData and CellData. This version is used when running in parallel. It gathers data to first node and saves 1 file.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The name of the file to be written.

PSWriterProxy.name: PSTLWriter

Documentation.short_help: Write stereo lithography files.

PSWriterProxy.Documentation: STLWriter writes stereo lithography (.stl) files in either ASCII or binary form. Stereo lithography files only contain triangles. If polygons with more than 3 vertices are present, only the first 3 vertices are written. Use TriangleFilter to convert polygons to triangles. This version of the reader is used when running in parallel. It gathers all the geometry to first node and saves 1 file.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The name of the file to be written.

WriterProxy.name: MetaImageWriter

Documentation.short_help: Write a binary UNC meta image data.

WriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write a binary UNC meta image data. This is a fairly simple yet powerful format consisting of a text header and a binary data section. MetaImage headers are expected to have extension: ".mha" or ".mhd"

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The name of the file to be written.

WriterProxy.name: PNGWriter

Documentation.short_help: Write image data as a PNG file.

WriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write image data as a PNG file. It supports 1 to 4 component data of unsigned char or unsigned short.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The name of the file to be written.

WriterProxy.name: XdmfWriter

Documentation.short_help: Writer data in Xdmf files.

WriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to writer data in eXtensible Data Model and Format *(XDMF) files.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

PWriterProxy.name: ExodusIIWriter

Documentation.short_help: Write Exodus II files.

PWriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write Exodus II files. Refere to http://endo.sandia.gov/SEACAS/ for more information about the Exodus II format.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

IntVectorProperty.name: WriteAllTimeSteps
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When WriteAllTimeSteps is turned ON, the writer is executed once for each timestep available from the reader.

PWriterProxy.name: EnSightWriter

Documentation.short_help: Write unstructured grid data as an EnSight file.

PWriterProxy.Documentation: Writer to write unstructured grid data as an EnSight file. Binary files written on one system may not be readable on other systems. Be sure to specify the endian-ness of the file when reading it into EnSight.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

IntVectorProperty.name: Magnification
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The magnification factor to use for the saved animation.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The name of the file to save the animation into.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: FrameRate
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Get/Set the frame rate to use for saving the animation. This frame rate is the frame rate that gets saved in the movie file generated, if applicable. If does not affect the FrameRate set on the animation scene at all. In other words, this is the playback frame rate and not the animation generation frame rate.

XMLPVAnimationWriterProxy.name: XMLPVAnimationWriter
XMLPVAnimationWriterProxy.Documentation: Internal writer proxy used when saving animation geometry to save all parts of the current source to the file with pieces spread across the server processes.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Name of the file to write.

SummaryHelperProxy.name: SummaryHelper
SummaryHelperProxy.Documentation: Internal proxy used to synchronize writing for summary files.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: The input filter/source whose output dataset is to written to the file.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The name of the file to be written.

IntVectorProperty.name: WriteAllTimeSteps
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When WriteAllTimeSteps is turned ON, the writer is executed once for each timestep available from the reader.
